prolific.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a prolific artist, writer etc produces many works of art, books etc
prolific.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a prolific sports player produces a lot of runs, goals etc
prolific.translation[0].definitions[1].e: the most prolific goalscorer this decade
prolific.translation[0].definitions[2].d: an animal or plant that is prolific produces many babies or many other plants
